hero.subtitle: Court recovery and protection from recovery, mediation, challenging transactions, disputes with banks and MFIs, eviction and representation in courts of all instances.
hero.consent: By sending an application, you agree to the processing of personal data

steps.step_01_desc: You leave an application or write on WhatsApp. We analyze your situation, examine documents, explain options and risks.
steps.step_02_desc: We form a plan: claim, negotiations, mediation, court, enforcement proceedings. We discuss estimated timelines and budget.
steps.step_03_desc: We sign a contract, fix the scope of services and cost. We prepare documents, file with the court, participate in hearings, accompany negotiations.
steps.step_04_desc: We get the court decision and achieve actual execution: recovery, eviction, removal of arrests, changes in encumbrances.

item_1.title: Debts, Credits and MFIs
item_1.desc: Professional assistance in disputes with credit organizations. We know how to stop debt collector pressure, challenge illegal fines, and achieve real debt write-off or comfortable payment terms.

item_2.title: Court Disputes
item_2.desc: Comprehensive support of your interests in courts of all instances. From situation analysis and document preparation to control over actual execution by bailiffs.

item_3.title: Real Estate
item_3.desc: Protection of your rights to housing and commercial objects. We ensure transaction security, help protect property from arrest and resolve any housing conflicts legally.

item_4.title: Business and Contracts
item_4.desc: Legal foundation for your business. We help minimize risks in contracts, protect interests in disputes with counterparties and ensure the legal security of your activities.

item_5.title: Consumer Disputes
item_5.desc: Money back for low-quality or non-rendered services. We specialize in disputes with online platforms, schools and info-business. We will return your money legally.

item_6.title: Mediation
item_6.desc: An effective way for peaceful dispute resolution with a neutral mediator's participation. We help reach a mutually beneficial agreement in civil, family and commercial conflicts, saving your time, money and business reputation.

about.title: About QazPrime
about.text: We specialize in protecting client interests in complex civil and economic disputes. Our goal is not just to represent you in court, but to achieve a real result: debt recovery, property protection or a settlement agreement.

founder.name: Birzhan Zheksembekov
founder.subtitle: Founder of QazPrime, lawyer and professional mediator
list: Practicing lawyer and professional mediator (out-of-court dispute resolution)
Specialization — court disputes, debt recovery and property protection
Representation in courts of all instances and support of enforcement proceedings
Practical approach: result-oriented and focused on peaceful conflict resolution
founder.quote: «My task is to protect your money and property, not just to 'write a claim'. I accompany the client to the result and explain every step in plain language.»

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: We can briefly guide you for free: tell you if a trial is needed, what the risks are and what to prepare. A detailed analysis with documents and strategy is a paid consultation.
faq.q2: How much does a consultation cost?
faq.a2: The price starts from 30,000 tenge and depends on complexity. We announce the exact amount after short initial communication.
faq.a3: Yes, we work throughout the Republic of Kazakhstan: online consultations, document preparation, court participation by proxy.
faq.q4: Do you represent interests in court?
faq.a4: Yes, we handle complex court support: document preparation, hearing participation, filing appeals, cassations, etc.
faq.q5: Will you help at the enforcement stage?
faq.a5: Yes, we interact with bailiffs, analyze enforcement documents, and help build a protection or recovery strategy.

contact.title: Free Consultation
contact.subtitle: Leave an application, and we will contact you within 15 minutes for an initial review of your situation.
